name: GetFilteredTags
description:
Retrieve compact tag records with optional filters.

Call this tool to get a list of compact tag records from Asana based on specific filter parameters. Requires 'tags:read' scope.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies how many tag records to return per page. Must be an integer between 1 and 100.

value_schema.description:
Results per page.
The number of objects to return per page. The value must be between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset token for pagination. Use the offset from the previous response to get the next page. If not provided, returns the first page.

value_schema.description:
Offset token.
An offset to the next page returned by the API. A pagination request will return an offset token, which can be used as an input parameter to the next request. If an offset is not passed in, the API will return the first page of results.
*Note: You can only pass in an offset that was returned to you via a previously paginated request.*

parameters.name: workspace_for_filtering
parameters.description: The workspace ID used to filter tags in the request.

value_schema.description: The workspace to filter tags on.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: A list of properties to include in the response, specified as strings. Use to retrieve fields not returned by default.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to 'true' for pretty JSON output with line breaks and indentation. Use for readability during debugging.
